description: Epics, Features, Stories and Story Steps must map to domain responsibilities

examples.description: Epic maps to multiple domain concepts and responsibilities
examples.content: Epic 'Manage Agile Bots' maps to Agile Bot: Generates MCP Server, MCP Bot Server Generator: Generates MCP Bot Server, MCP Bot Server Generator: Generates Bot Tools

examples.description: Feature maps to specific domain concept
examples.content: Feature 'Generate MCP Bot Server And Tools' maps to MCP Bot Server Generator concept and all its generation responsibilities

examples.description: Story maps to domain concept and responsibility
examples.content: Story 'Generate MCP Bot Server' maps to MCP Bot Server Generator: Generates MCP Bot Server

examples.description: Story step maps exactly to domain responsibility
examples.content: Story step 'Agile Bot loads Workflow from Bot Config' maps to Agile Bot: Loads Workflow: Workflow, Bot Config (exact match)

examples.description: Story step maps partially to broader domain responsibility
examples.content: Story step 'Project checks project_area parameter' maps to Project: Manages Project State: Project Bot State, File System (partial match - checking is part of managing)

examples.description: Story step can map to multiple responsibilities
examples.content: Story step 'AI Chat detects trigger words and routes to Behavior Action Tool via Bot MCP Server' maps to both AI Chat: Detects Trigger Words And Routes To Tools AND MCP Bot Server: Routes Tool Calls

examples.description: Don't create story steps without domain concept mapping
examples.content: Story step 'System processes request' - No domain concept 'System' exists, no mapping possible

examples.description: Don't use vague story steps that don't map to responsibilities
examples.content: Story step 'Tool does something' - Too vague, doesn't map to specific responsibility

examples.description: Don't create epics without domain concept mapping
examples.content: Epic 'User Management' - No domain concepts or responsibilities related to user management exist

examples.description: Don't create generic features that don't map to domain concepts
examples.content: Feature 'Process Data' - Too generic, doesn't map to specific domain concepts
